repository.corpname: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

did.physloc: Materials are stored off-site, and will require additional retrieval time. Please contact the Special Collections Research Center for more information.
did.abstract: Dr. Aldon Nielsen is a poet, literary critic and currently the George and Barbara Kelly Professor of American Literature at Pennsylvania State University. This collection contains drafts, unpublished and published works by Alden Nielsen. The collection also contains correspondence with poets and also about his publications. The materials date 1975-2006.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: To the extent that the donor owns copyright, the donor has retained copyright in his works donated to The George Washington University. For activities that the researcher determines fall under fair use as defined under U. S. Copyright Law, no permission to cite or publish is required. Researchers are responsible for determining who may hold materials' copyrights, determining if the intended re-use falls under fair use, and obtaining approval from the copyright holder if the intended use does not fall under fair use. Researchers do not need anything further from The George Washington University Special Collections Research Center. Please contact Special Collections if the copyright status of the materials you wish to reuse is unclear. Staff will provide additional information.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please cite unpublished materials in the following way:
Please provide the title and date of item, catalog number (if applicable it will be found written on the folder), name of the collection, name of the repository, and location of the repository.

Example: James Oglethorpe to the Trustees, 13 January 1876, RG0001 Series 1, Box 4, Folder 3. Records of the Board of Trustees, Special Collections Research Center, Gelman Library, The George Washington University, Washington, D.C.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is not yet processed.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of Aldon Lynn Nielsen, 2022 March 14 (Accession 2022.009)

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Aldon Nielsen is a poet, literary critic and currently the George and Barbara Kelly Professor of American Literature at Pennsylvania State University. He has degrees from the Federal City College and from the George Washington University. He previously taught at Howard University, San Jose State University, the University of California, Los Angeles and Loyola Marymount University. Nielsen is the author of numerous publications including scholarly publications as well as edited collections and books of poetry.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection is not yet processed and researchers may need more time to use it for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains drafts, unpublished and published works by Alden Nielsen. The collection also contains correspondence with poets and also about his publications. The materials date 1975-2006.
